Oh and by the way I found it last night on Mininova and igotflame37 was right this movie was frickin creepy as hell! I had to wait until this morning to get some sleep lol Kept hearing shit after the movie was over! I love a good horror movie!

Yeah, pirate this one, it is way way over-rated, the internet hype so manufactured I feel duped to have bought a real ticket. Entirely dull, derivative of Blair and Blair's precursors, and with a Steven Speilberg bogus ending. Pirate its ass.
